text.title: Vatican to Palestinians: Remove us from your Draft Resolution to UN General Assembly
text.head: Vatican to Palestinians: Remove us from your Draft Resolution to UN General Assembly
Sources

list.item: "Vatican won’t join Palestinians on United Nations flag-raising request" — iFreePress , August 27, 2015
Cara Anna. "Palestinians, Vatican could raise UN flags before pope visit" — Associated Press , August 25, 2015
Louis Charbonneau. "Vatican says won't co-sponsor Palestinian flag initiative at U.N." — Reuters , August 25, 2015
